entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming northeast 20 early this morning. High minus 5. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 25. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 8. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Monday 02 May 2016
